mapper.sql: USERID, USERNAME, ADMINID, ORGID, PASSWORD, STAMPPASSWORD, USERLEVEL, ISLEADER, EXPIREDDATE, EXPIRED, LOGINTIME, LOGINIP, LASTTIME, LASTIP, SKIN, IPCONFIG, LANGCODE, USERTYPE, POSTID, SEX, BIRTHDAY, IDCARD, SCHOOL, GRADUATION, DEGREE, MAJOR, COUNTRY, PROVINCE, CITY, ADDRESS, POSTCODE, PHONE, FAX, MOBILE, EMAIL, REMARK, CREATOR, CREATETIME, MODIFIER, MODIFYTIME, ERPID, SUPERIORLEADER, POST
mapper.select:
select
distinct
'true' as QUERYID,
from AUSER
order by ${orderByClause}

mapper.update:
update AUSER
USERNAME = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ADMINID = #{adminid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORGID = #{orgid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PASSWORD = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STAMPPASSWORD = #{stamppassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
USERLEVEL = #{userlevel,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ISLEADER = #{isleader,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
EXPIREDDATE = #{expireddate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
EXPIRED = #{expired,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
LOGINTIME = #{logintime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
LOGINIP = #{loginip,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

IDCARD = #{idcard,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SCHOOL = #{school,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
GRADUATION = #{graduation,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
DEGREE = #{degree,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
MAJOR = #{major,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
COUNTRY = #{country,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PROVINCE = #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CITY = #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ADDRESS = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
POSTCODE = #{postcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PHONE = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FAX = #{fax,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

ERPID = #{erpid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SUPERIORLEADER = #{superiorleader,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

where USERID = #{userid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
